directions: Step 1 Combine the Chinese rice wine and oyster sauce in a small bowl.

Step 2 Heat a wok over high heat. Spray with canola oil spray to lightly grease. Add one-third of the lamb and stir-fry for 1-2 minutes or until browned. Transfer to a heatproof bowl. Repeat, in 2 more batches, with the remaining lamb, reheating the wok between batches.

Step 3 Heat the wok over high heat. Spray with canola oil spray to lightly grease. Add the chilli and garlic, and stir-fry for 1 minute. Add the broccoli and stock, and stir-fry for 2 minutes. Add the shallot and stir-fry for 1 minute or until the shallot softens slightly.
Step 4 Add lamb and rice wine mixture to the wok, and stir-fry for 1-2 minutes or until heated through. Serve with steamed rice.
ingredients: 2 fresh long red chillies, deseeded, thinly sliced
60ml (1/4 cup) Campbell's Real Stock Chicken Salt Reduced
6 shallots, ends trimmed, cut into 4cm lengths
1/2 cup coarsely shredded fresh mint leaves
steamed SunRice Basmati Rice, to serve
title: Lamb, broccoli, chilli and mint stir-fry
